description: a. Sword straight metal blade with 3 peg holes and engraved dragon on one side and sword on the other; grip with chased metalwork menuki in form of dragon at tip, wound in dark red fabric;  b. Scabbard lacquer with phoenix decor, soft metal with gold and silver inlay horimono tiger at tip; fabric tie
title: Shinshintō dagger in aikuchi mount with dragon, tiger, and phoenix decor
